articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Hosiery Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Hosiery Factory
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory.
					 He went round the room dedicated to the history of the factory.
					
					 He said that the factory established at the initiative of President Kim Il Sung is associated with the undying feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by making sure that all necessary modern hosiery production processes were built, while showing deep concern for consumer goods for people's life.
					
					 Visiting the factory in December of 2010, Kim Jong Il listened to what people said about the goods produced at the newly built women's hosiery shop, noted there is nothing to spare for the people if they like and set forth the task for expanding the production capacity, Kim Jong Un said, adding that modern men's hosiery production processes were built thanks to the benevolent measure taken by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un looked round women's and men's hosiery shops, sample room and other places to learn in detail about the production and quality of goods, giving precious instructions for improving the management and operation  of the factory.
					
					 The production capacity of the factory is very big, he noted, calling for operating all production processes in full capacity so as to meet the demands of people for hosiery.
					
					 Everybody should use brain to produce goods meeting the tastes and specific features of people as the demands for hosiery vary according to seasons, fashion, age and sex, he said, underscoring the need to pay deep attention to designing hosiery in the direction of ensuring utility and beauty of goods and increasing economic efficiency, in particular.
					
					 He instructed the factory to modernize the production processes at a higher level and properly work out management and business strategies to improve all production organization and management activities including the technical preparations, production, packing and sale of goods.
					
					 Saying that the factory has an important mission and role to perform, he expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the factory would successfully fulfill their mission.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Jae Il and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean IS's Farce of Renaming Its Plot-breeding Center
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korean IS's Farce of Renaming Its Plot-breeding Center 
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released information bulletin No. 1071 Thursday denouncing the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service's farce of renaming its plot-breeding center.
					 Recently the IS renamed its "Central Joint Interrogation Center" "Center for Protection of Defected north Koreans" as its true colors were brought to light as the center specializing in alluring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK and breeding plots against it, the information bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 The center set up by the IS in 2008 has operated as a base for breeding plots and making conspiracies against the DPRK. Its mission was to allure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK via a third country before taking them away to south Korea and put in custody for questioning  in solitary cells for more than 180 days those who went adrift in the sea, perpetrate all sorts of evil acts against them and cook up various north Korean spyring cases. 
					
					 No wonder, south Korean media and civic organizations and people of all social standings denounce the center as Guantanamo of the south Korean version and a "base for cooking up spy cases". They even filed a lawsuit against the existence of the center and human rights abuses practiced there, branding them as violation of the "constitution" and strongly demanded its dismantlement.
					
					 Much upset by the public rebuff and censure, the puppet IS was compelled to change its name.
					
					 This is an open farce revealing its intention to prevent the disclosure of its hideous human rights abuses and more openly carry out the operation of alluring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK and forcing defection upon them.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the puppet group cover up its despicable criminal nature.
					
					 The IS should stop such poor burlesque and disband the den of plot-breeding and conspiracy at once.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life should wage a dynamic action for the disbandment of the "Center for Protection of Defected north Koreans", not being taken in by the cunning trick of the puppet group.

articles.title: Talks Held between FMs of DPRK, Vietnamã€€
articles.content:
Talks Held between FMs of DPRK, Vietnam
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, who is leading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Vietnam, and Pham Binh Minh, deputy prime minister and concurrently foreign minister of Vietnam, were held at the state guest house of its government on Aug. 6.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation, the DPRK ambassador to Vietnam and his embassy officials, and from the Vietnamese side were officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged their views on the issue of developing the bilateral ties of friendship and matters of mutual concern.
					
					 Pham Binh Minh warmly congratulated supreme leader Kim Jong Un upon his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK held in last April.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would achieve great successes in their efforts to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that it is the consistent stand of the Vietnamese party and government to invariably set store by the traditional relations of friendship provided and cultivated by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and continue boosting the ties in the common interests of the two peoples.
					
					 Vietnam will always back the DPRK in its stance to peacefully reunify the country by federal formula free from foreign interference by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation, he said.
					
					 That day he gave a reception for the DPRK government delegation.
					
					 On the same day Ri Su Yong separately met and had a talk with Hoang Binh Quan, chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, Cao Duc Phat, minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, and Nguyen Cam Tu, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, and placed a wreath before the mausoleum of Ho Chi Minh.

articles.title: Greetings to C.C., Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front
articles.content:
Greetings to C.C., Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Thursday sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of its founding. 
					 The message said: We are pleased that the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front has registered great successes in the struggle for the stability of the country and its socio-economic development, overcoming all difficulties and challenges.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would continue developing on good terms, wishing the front bigger successes in its activities to strengthen it and achieve the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Chairman of United Socialist Party of Venezuela
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chairman of United Socialist Party of Venezuela 
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Nicolas Maduro Moros upon his election as chairman of the United Socialist Party of Venezuela at its successful Third Congress.
					 The message said that Nicolas Maduro Moros's assumption of office as the chairman of the party is an expression of deep trust and great expectation of all its party members towards him. 
					
					 It sincerely wished him great success in his responsible work for implementing the decision of the Third Congress of the party and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the common struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Leaves for South Africa
articles.content:
Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Leaves for South Africa
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Architects Union of Korea led by Vice-Chairman Sim Yong Hak left here Thursday to take part in the 26th general meeting of the International Union of Architects to be held in Durban, South Africa.

articles.title: Economical Boiler Developed
articles.content:
Economical Boiler Developed
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A research group of the Physics Faculty of the University of Sciences in the DPRK has recently developed a coal-saving boiler.
					 The previous boilers were low in heat output due to the loss of heat through the evaporation of coal kneaded with mud. 
					
					 But the new one is fed with briquette, generating heat output twice higher than the previous ones. And its coal consumption is 30-40 percent lower than that of the previous ones.
					
					 It can be also fed with inferior coal.

articles.title: August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement Active in DPRK
articles.content:
August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement Active in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- 30 years have passed after the August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement began in the DPRK.
					 The movement was initiated by leader Kim Jong Il when he went round the Pyongyang City light industrial goods exhibition on August 3, Juche 73 (1984).
					
					 It is a mass movement to produce more consumer goods by making effective use of untapped reserves in reliance on the creativity of popular masses.
					
					 Production units for August 3 consumer goods across the country are concentrating their efforts on boosting the quality of goods.
					
					 In particular, housewives' workteams are playing a big role in developing the movement. They are producing good-quality consumer goods including foodstuffs and sundry goods made with agricultural products, natural materials and others and selling them at direct sales shops.
					
					 As part of the efforts to develop the movement, exhibitions of new products have been held on a regular basis.
					
					 Now in Pyongyang, a national exhibition of August 3 consumer goods opened at the People's Palace of Culture is drawing a large number of visitors.

articles.title: National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods under Way in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods under Way in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of August 3 consumer goods was opened at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang on August 1.
					 On display at the exhibition are more than 1 500 varieties of over 124 000 pieces presented by factories, enterprises, housewives' workteams and reutilization production workteams.
					
					 Pyongyang City presented more than 1 000 kinds of goods to the exhibition.
					
					 Among them are raincoats made by the Rangnang District housewives' workteam management office and handbags and handicrafts by the Tongdaewon District housewives' workteam management office.
					
					 Ko In Sil, a department director of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, told KCNA that bags on display are competent to be exported.
					
					 Seen on the stand of North Phyongan Province are different kinds of consumer goods including enameled wares and utensils.
					
					 Displayed on the stand of Ryanggang Province are hats, cushions and slippers made with sedge.
					
					 Consumer goods presented by other provinces are appreciated for their high quality.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Guides Historic Meetings during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Guides Historic Meetings during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war of the Korean revolution records historic meetings which indicated the strategic and tactical policies to bring about a great event of the country's liberation and the ever-victorious path of the Juche revolution.
					 President Kim Il Sung held the Meeting of Leading Personnel of the Young Communist League and the Anti-Imperialist Youth League at Kalun on June 30, Juche 19 (1930) and made a report "The Path of the Korean Revolution".
					
					 The Meeting of Party and Young Communist League Cadres was held at Mingyuegou, Yanji County from December 16 to 25, 1931.
					
					 At the Dahuangwai Meeting held in February, 1935 the President exposed and denounced the crimes of those who tried to use the struggle against the "Minsaengdan" for narrow-minded chauvinist and factional purposes and declared that to struggle for the Korean revolution is the independent rights of the Korean revolutionaries which no one can block or substitute for.
					
					 The Korean revolution greeted a new phase with the Nanhutou Meeting held from February 27 to March 3, 1936 as a momentum.
					
					 He convened the Inaugural Meeting of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland at Tongjiang, Fusong County in May, 1936.
					
					 The Conference of the Military and Political Cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) held at Xigang, Fusong County in March, 1937 was the one which signified a historic watershed in the history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The Nanpaizi Meeting which was held for more than ten days from November 25, 1938 indicated strategic and tactical tasks and ways for positively overcoming the difficulties with proactive tactics and bringing about a steady surge in the Korean revolution from the steadfast independent stand.
					
					 At the Beidadingzi Meeting held in April, 1939 the President set forth the policy of uninterruptedly striking the Japanese imperialist aggressors with active counterattack and advancing into the homeland.
					
					 With the Meeting of Military and Political Cadres of the KPRA held at Xiaohaerbaling, Dunhua County from August 10 to 11, 1940 as a momentum the anti-Japanese armed struggle entered into a new phase of its development, a phase of the struggle for the final victory in the cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 At the Military and Political Cadres of the KPRA held on July 30, 1945 the President announced the plan for the final offensive operation to liberate the country.
					
					 In response to the order of the President to start all-out  attack for the country's liberation on August 9, 1945 the KPRA units and people's armed groups and organizations for  armed uprising at home wiped out the Japanese imperialist aggressors and their colonial ruling machines and achieved the historic victory of the country's liberation on August 15.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Escalating Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. House of Representatives passed a bill on intensified sanctions against the DPRK. The bill calls for cutting off north Korea's financial source of obtaining dollar and other foreign currencies to prevent it from developing nuclear weapons and missiles.
					 Meanwhile, the chief U.S. negotiator for the six-party talks said at a hearing before the U.S. Congress that the U.S. would continue pursuing its pressure policy towards north Korea as long as it does not stop the nuclear program.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article observes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. bluffing that it would continue pressing for north Korea's denuclearization is aimed to render the relations between the DPRK and its neighboring countries tense and create an atmosphere of putting sanctions and pressure on it.
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to defame the dignity of the DPRK with groundless lies and fabrications and hinder its advance through all sanctions and blockade. However, this is a mistake prompted by the U.S. poor understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. successive rulers had understood even a little the DPRK which has bolstered up its national power on the basis of the self-supporting national economy, they would not have held the useless stick of sanctions.
					
					 The world's biggest arms dealer U.S. may know well how powerful economic potentials and military muscle the DPRK has as it has taken diversified military countermeasures on a regular basis.
					
					 Even though the imperialists have imposed persistent sanctions on the DPRK, it has remained unperturbed. It built monumental edifices, successfully launched satellites and bolstered up the war deterrence by dint of Songun and is now stepping up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The U.S. policy-makers should give up their worn-out "policy of strategic patience", though belatedly, and mind their internal affairs rather than patching up the threadbare net of sanctions.

articles.title: U.S. Had Better Cogitate about Nuclear Stand-off with DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Had Better Cogitate about Nuclear Stand-off with DPRK: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Locklear, commander-in-chief of the U.S. forces in the Pacific, at a recent emergency press conference said the U.S. is ready to cope with the worst situation including a nuclear threat from the north, while describing its nuclear and missile capabilities as a serious challenge to the international community.
					 This is sophism to justify Washington's hostile policy toward the DPRK, and self-confidence of those who are utterly unaware of who their rival is.
					
					 The actual provocation and threat to the Korean peninsula at present are a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the former's belligerent nuclear strategy.
					
					 Recently the U.S. officially announced it would apply "tailored deterrence strategy", a scenario for a preemptive attack on the north, into Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises it plans to stage from mid-August after conducting joint naval maneuvers with the puppet army with a flotilla of nuclear carrier George Washington involved.
					
					 The daily increasing nuclear threat and challenge of the U.S. compels the DPRK to bolster the nuclear force qualitatively and quantitatively to protect the dignity and security of the country and the nation and guarantee peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The Voice of Russia recently commented that the policy of ignoring the DPRK's stand is, in the final analysis, little short of helping it become a nuclear power.
					
					 The DPRK's access to a powerful nuclear force was a just option for defending its sovereignty and peace.
					
					 The U.S. persistent nuclear threats compel the DPRK to steadily bolster its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Given that the U.S. and the puppet forces of south Korea continue staging nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, in particular, the DPRK will take countermeasures for self-defence which will include missile launch, nuclear test and all other programs.
					
					 Units of the ground, naval, air and anti-air forces of the Korean People's Army including the strategic forces are staging without let-up exercises for bolstering the nation's capability for self-defence under simulated conditions including the firing of super-precision tactical rockets and artillery firing drills with various missions. These are part of those countermeasures.
					
					 The army of the DPRK is reliably protecting the dignity and security of the country and the nation, tightly holding such treasured sword of justice as strategic rockets tipped with nuclear warheads powerful enough to strike the U.S. mainland. This reflects the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. had better to think twice over the nuclear stand-off with the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Censured for Distorting Public Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Censured for Distorting Public Mindset
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, on August 4 carried an editorial denouncing the puppet ruling party for distorting public mindset as regards the issue of  probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial said that the "Saenuri Party" is distorting the fact as if the people were supporting the party as regards the political situation about the ferry Sewol after the announcement of the results of the recent parliamentary by-election.
					
					 The overwhelming majority of respondents of the opinion poll conducted on August 1 held that the cause of the accident has not been properly probed and the right to investigation should be given to the fact-finding committee, it noted.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party", however, is trying to evade the blame for the disaster, misinterpreting the results of the election, it charged.
					
					 If the party persists in mocking at the people, it will repeatedly confirm that the party is the first target of reform, the editorial stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party's Hypocritical Compensation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party's Hypocritical Compensation under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet National Assembly building on August 4 protesting against the "Saenuri Party's" hypocritical farce for compensation, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers recalled that the "Saenuri Party" decided to form an ad hoc committee for supporting victims of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 They said that what the bereaved families want is the probe into the truth about the disaster, neither reparation nor compensation.
					
					 The presidential chief of staff of Chongwadae and others should present themselves as witnesses to probe the truth, they held.
					
					 The Council of Professors for Democracy and other teachers organizations held a press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza on the same day and demanded the unhindered probe into the truth about the disaster and the institution of a special law.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses in S. Korean Puppet Army Baffle Human Imagination
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses in S. Korean Puppet Army Baffle Human Imagination
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Human rights abuses in the south Korean puppet army baffle human imagination, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore on August 4.
					 Sergeants and corporals in a division of the army did not hesitate to commit such a despicable act of urinating on privates.
					
					 Such an act was also done in a transport company of an army hospital.
					
					 Superiors openly committed such an act of stripping bare inferiors and pouring water over them.
					
					 Plunder by superiors has been unabated. Superiors took money running tens of thousands of won from inferiors by way of borrowing.
					
					 Reporting about this, the newspaper said the violence is unabated in the army because there is a lack of management and control over units and the higher body hushes up such cases in fear of the adverse impact they may have on the promotion.

articles.title: Fascist Action by S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Assailed
articles.content:
Fascist Action by S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement titled "Lawmaker Ri Sok Gi is innocent, set him free unconditionally" on July 28.
					 The prosecution inflicted heavy penalties on the suspects of the plotted rebellion case including lawmaker from an opposition party Ri Sok Gi, the statement said, strongly denouncing the act of painting normal party activities as espionage activities through false investigation and fabrication. 
					
					 The brazen-faced prosecution which sentenced innocent people to death by groundlessly charging them with spy activities in the past is repeating those crimes, it said, and went on:
					
					 The prosecution has to do away with the bad habit of inflicting heavy penalties on those with whom it is displeased on charges of spy activities.
					
					 The court should call to task the prosecution and let it set free the detainees.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Projected Joint Military Exercises Condemned by Korean in China
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Projected Joint Military Exercises Condemned by Korean in China
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Chong Su, vice-chairman of the Jilin Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, released an article on August 1 supporting the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers for their moves to kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The article said that the DPRK has made consistent efforts to defuse tensions while demanding a halt to the nuclear war exercises.
					
					 The U.S., however, is going to stage the joint military exercises while seeking only confrontation and war so that a war may break out anytime, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces following it should stop acting rash, clearly understanding the DPRK with powerful military muscle.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses, positively accept the just proposals of the DPRK and opt for achieving the national reconciliation and cooperation, though belatedly.
					
					 The Koreans in China together with all Koreans aspiring after peace on the Korean peninsula and the world peace-loving people will fight it out against the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces following them.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean Victims to Forcible Drafting Held in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean Victims to Forcible Drafting Held in Japan
 Tokyo, August 6 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service for Korean victims to forcible drafting by Japanese imperialism took place in Kooriyama City, Fukushima Prefecture, Japan on August 2 under the co-sponsorship of the Fukushima Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the Fukushima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship.
					 Present there were Chongryon officials and compatriots in Fukushima Prefecture and members of Japanese organizations.
					
					 Speakers said: We should never forget the atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 They condemned the Japanese imperialists for turning Korea into a colony, taking away many Koreans to Japan, forcing harsh labor on them and killing them.
					
					 They said that they would do their best to bring to light the criminal acts of the Japanese imperialists in order to give vent to the grudge of those who met a grievous death in an alien land.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Works Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Works Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" were posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on July 29.
					 Kim Jong Il's work published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996) indicates the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original one that has been developed and systemized with its intrinsic principles, and a revolutionary and popular one that truly serves the people in their struggle for independence.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the party and thoroughly applying it to the revolutionary practice.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble career of loving the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates the important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Global Independence Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Global Independence Praised by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "For global independence" on July 30.
					 The article said that President Kim Il Sung not only advanced the idea on the global independence for the first time in history but also clearly indicated the orientation and ways for realizing it.
					
					 It said: He positively encouraged the people of colonial countries in their struggle for national liberation to realize the global independence.
					
					 He met many revolutionaries of the world and taught them the strategies and tactics on the struggle for national liberation in colonies.
					
					 He also positively rendered material and moral assistance to the people of the newly independent countries in their efforts to build a new society.
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by him in accomplishing the cause of global independence is that he developed the non-aligned movement.
					
					 He conducted energetic activities to strengthen the NAM into the powerful anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to developing the world socialist movement.
					
					 His exploits for accomplishing the cause of global independence will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association UK on its website on July 31.
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), says that the Korean nation is the driving force for national reunification, and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang.
					Primero, el Mariscal recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					En la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang construida por iniciativa del Presidente Kim Il Sung estan impregnadas las inmarcesibles hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien se preocupaba incluso por los articulos de consumo masivo necesarios para la vida del pueblo e hizo equiparla completamente con modernos procesos de produccion de medias, senalo.
					
					Al visitarla en diciembre de 2010, el Dirigente se entero de las repercusiones del pueblo sobre los productos del taller de medias femeninas recien construido y presento las tareas de aumentar mas la capacidad productiva diciendo que no hay nada que escatimar para el pueblo, recordo el Mariscal y continuo que gracias a las medidas llenas de amor del Dirigente, fue preparado tambien el moderno proceso de la produccion de medias masculinas.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica inclusive los talleres de medias femeninas y masculinas y la sala de exhibicion de las muestras, el Mariscal averiguo en detalles el estado de produccion y la calidad de productos y dio instrucciones valiosas para mejorar la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					Al decir que es grande la capacidad productiva de la fabrica ordeno satisfacer las demandas de medias del pueblo poniendo en pleno funcionamiento todos los procesos de produccion.
					
					Como son diferentes las demandas sobre las medias segun las estaciones, la moda, la edad y el sexo, hay que investigar mucho para producir las medias adecuadas al gusto y la peculiaridad del pueblo y deben prestar profunda atencion  a disenar bien para asegurar la utilidad y el valor estetico de los productos y aumentar la eficiencia economica, subrayo.
					
					Y hay que realizar en un nivel mas alto la modernizacion de los procesos  productivos y trazar bien las estrategias administrativa y empresarial para mejorar toda la organizacion productiva y actividades administrativas inclusive la preparacion tecnica, la produccion, el embalaje y la venta, asevero.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que son muy importantes el deber y papel de la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica cumpliran mejor con su mision asumida.
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Jae Il y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: CRPP publica informacion para condenar farsa de SNI
articles.content:
CRPP publica informacion para condenar farsa de SNI
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 7 la informacion no.1071 para condenar el cambio del "centro conjunto central de interrogacion" del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea.
					Al ser descubierta la verdadera naturaleza de dicho centro que solo se entrega al rapto y secuestro a los habitantes norcoreanos y al complot contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el SNI lo sustituyo como "Centro de Proteccion de Norcoreanos Desertados". 
					
					Asi inicia la informacion y continua:
					
					A decir verdad, el "centro conjunto central de interrogacion" organizado en 2008 por el SNI, es el nido de los complots y las conspiraciones anti-RPDC que a traves del tercer pais llevo al Sur de Corea a los habitantes norcoreanos raptados y secuestrados o naufragados y les interrogo mas de 180 dias metiendolos en la celda individual y maltratandolos.
					
					Por tal motivo, los medios de prensa, las entidades sociales y otras capas del Sur de Corea lo condenan como "Guantanamo" de version surcoreana y el "centro de invencion del caso de espia" y exigen fuertemente su desmantelamiento pleiteando legalmente con su existencia y con la violacion de derechos humanos calificandolos de "violacion a la Constitucion".
					
					El SNI muy aprieto por la critica de la opinion publica cambio el nombre del "centro conjunto central de interrogacion" para impedir que se revelen sus crimenes de lesa humanidad y desplegar mas abiertamente la campana de seduccion y secuestro a los habitantes norcoreanos.
					
					Pero, la banda titere surcoreana no puede ocultar con nada su vil naturaleza criminal.
					
					El SNI debe poner fin a su vil farsa y disolver cuanto antes el nido de las intrigas y conspiraciones.
					
					Los distintos sectores del Sur de Corea no deben ser enganados por la astuta artimana de la banda titere sino librar la lucha por disolver el "centro de proteccion de norcoreanos desertados".

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Vietnam
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Vietnam
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 6 en la Casa de Protocolo del Gobierno de Vietnam, las conversaciones entre el canciller Ri Su Yong, quien encabeza la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de visita en la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, y el vicepremier y canciller del gobierno de Vietnam, Pham Binh Minh.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, los miembros de la delegacion, el embajador y miembros de la sede diplomatica en Vietnam, y por la vietnamita, los relacionados con la cancilleria.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises y los asuntos de interes mutuo.
					
					El vicepremier y canciller del gobierno vietnamita felicito calidamente la reeleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema efectuado en abril pasado.
					
					Deseo que bajo la sabia direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezada por el Mariscal, el pueblo coreano logre grandes exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Se refirio a que el partido y el gobierno de Vietnam mantienen la invariable posicion de apreciar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad, preparadas y promovidas por el Presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente Kim Il Sung y ampliarlas y desarrollarlas constantemente conforme al interes mutuo de los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Subrayo que Vietnam siempre apoyara la posicion de la RPDC de lograr la reunificacion de la patria de manera pacifica y federal uniendo las fuerzas de entre los connacionales y rechazando la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Ese dia, el vicepremier y canciller del gobierno vietnamita ofrecio un banquete en honor de la delegacion gubernamental de la RPDC.
					
					El mismo dia, el canciller coreano Ri departio por separado con el presidente de la comision para los asuntos exteriores del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, Hoang Binh Quan, el ministro de Agricultura y Desarrollo Rural, Cao Duc Phat, y el viceministro de Industria y Comercio, Nguyen Cam Tu, y deposito una ofrenda floral ante la tumba del Presidente Ho Chi Minh.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita Union Nacional Africana Zimbabwe-Frente Patriotico
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita Union Nacional Africana Zimbabwe-Frente Patriotico
						
Pyongyang, 7 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 51o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union Nacional Africana Zimbabwe-Frente Patriotico, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion al CC de ese partido africano.
					La misiva expresa alegria de que la UNAZ logra grandes exitos en la lucha por la estabilidad y el desarrollo socioeconomico del  pais superando todas las dificultades y desafios.
					
					Desea mayores exitos en las actividades del UNAZ por fortalecer su organizacion y lograr la prosperidad del pais y expresa conviccion de que sigan desarrollandose favorablemente las  tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos.
